channel.title: RSPSOFT Release v1.0
channel.description:
Welcome to RSPSOFT Base Final devolution Released by killmess
features -NPC RANGE (includes) - arrow draw back - correct projectile heights and timings - correct max hit formula - all range items work - prefect hit delays depending on the distance - arrow deleting - basically looks just like how rs use to be - no process timing - level requirements - good bonus makes you hit higher - NPC MAGE (includes) - correct projectile heights and timing - correct max hits - level requirements - rune deleting - small compact size around 5kb - 90% correct animations - splashing - NO process timing -NPC MELEE (includes) - prefectly timed, NO process - fairly accurate max hit formula - Dharok effects, hits higher when hp is low (based from str bonus and str level, not just adding a random number....) - all specials work - replace the special handler with the smaller one which is like 2kb? - prefect dieing, uses emote, does not die instantly has a slight wait. -PVP MAGE (includes) - player bonus determines if they will splash or hit - if you splash the damage does not show - ancient makes use there effects (ice barrage switchs gfx once frozen, blood barrage steals hp, smoke barrage poisons) - proper timing for ancients, ice burst hits nearly instantly, ice barrage hits a bit more delayed and ice blitz takes the longest to hit, works prefect for rushing - if the player is frozen it doesnt stack up the timer each time you try and refreeze, you must wait till there not frozen to be able to refreeze them. - all level requirements - rune deleting - no massing -PVP RANGED (includes) - same as npcs - also player bonus's determine if you hit or miss -PVP MELEE (includes) - same as npcs - also player bonus's determine if you hit or miss -PRAYER ADDED (includes) - all protection types work, str prayer also adds more damage. - protection types makes the damage be cut in half from what it would of been. - no massing with draining, stays at a steady rate. - nothing else added, still working on it -POTIONS (includes) - all potions works - need to make potions lower the stat back down to the original stat. -LAG ISSUES (includes) - this server used very low resources, stays at about 0.5 - 1.8 cpu usage. - alot of things have been taken out from the process and used in a different way for timing. - stable, has not crashed on my yet, but i have noticed a logout bug but have no idea what causes it, note this only lasts 15 secs then logs them out. - client is only 300kb - PVP, this server has a very nice pvp to it, this makes delta look like rsc, seriously. -PVP following - follows player, if frozen you cannot follow anyone - follows with ranging and also magic and melee - if following a player then gets frozen, you cannot move. SKILLS added basic firemaking and thieving
What ive done. [CODE] 1 - Fixet the trading Bug 2 - Changed Home 3 - Added basic modern teleport + ancient 4 - New shops 5 - new commands.[/CODE] Commands [QUOTE] ::pure ::banuser ::home (isent really needed) ::switch (v2 will have altar)[/QUOTE] I now its not much but! its my first time im not using deltascape...so i guess its better than nothing i guess i got tired of delta.. [p.s] dont mind about the size there is an backup folder thats why.. Pictures Ancient Teleport [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-10.png[/img] modern Teleport [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-11.png[/img] Rune require to use the teleports [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-12.png[/img] Combat [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i576.photobucket.com/albums/ss201/amstaf_album/Picture-9.png[/img] Download http://uppit.com/v/48UUJT4W Use this client to play els you'll dc when you use ancient http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VW8Y5P6K Credits 95% for killmess 5% for me i GUESS!

item.title: RSPSOFT Release v1.0
item.dc:creator: @coolplet coolplet
item.description:
@coolplet wrote:

Welcome to RSPSOFT

Base Final devolution Released by killmess

features

-NPC RANGE (includes)

  • arrow draw back

  • correct projectile heights and timings

  • correct max hit formula

  • all range items work

  • prefect hit delays depending on the distance

  • arrow deleting

  • basically looks just like how rs use to be

  • no process timing

  • level requirements

  • good bonus makes you hit higher

  • NPC MAGE (includes)

  • correct projectile heights and timing

  • correct max hits

  • level requirements

  • rune deleting

  • small compact size around 5kb

  • 90% correct animations

  • splashing

  • NO process timing

-NPC MELEE (includes)

  • prefectly timed, NO process
  • fairly accurate max hit formula
  • Dharok effects, hits higher when hp is low (based from str bonus and str level, not just adding a random number…)
  • all specials work
  • replace the special handler with the smaller one which is like 2kb?
  • prefect dieing, uses emote, does not die instantly has a slight wait.

-PVP MAGE (includes)

  • player bonus determines if they will splash or hit
  • if you splash the damage does not show
  • ancient makes use there effects (ice barrage switchs gfx once frozen, blood barrage steals hp, smoke barrage poisons)
  • proper timing for ancients, ice burst hits nearly instantly, ice barrage hits a bit more delayed and ice blitz takes the longest to hit, works prefect for rushing
  • if the player is frozen it doesnt stack up the timer each time you try and refreeze, you must wait till there not frozen to be able to refreeze them.
  • all level requirements
  • rune deleting
  • no massing

-PVP RANGED (includes)

  • same as npcs
  • also player bonus’s determine if you hit or miss

-PVP MELEE (includes)

  • same as npcs
  • also player bonus’s determine if you hit or miss

-PRAYER ADDED (includes)

  • all protection types work, str prayer also adds more damage.
  • protection types makes the damage be cut in half from what it would of been.
  • no massing with draining, stays at a steady rate.
  • nothing else added, still working on it

-POTIONS (includes)

  • all potions works
  • need to make potions lower the stat back down to the original stat.

-LAG ISSUES (includes)

  • this server used very low resources, stays at about 0.5 - 1.8 cpu usage.

  • alot of things have been taken out from the process and used in a different way for timing.

  • stable, has not crashed on my yet, but i have noticed a logout bug but have no idea what causes it, note this only lasts 15 secs then logs them out.

  • client is only 300kb

  • PVP, this server has a very nice pvp to it, this makes delta look like rsc, seriously.

-PVP following

  • follows player, if frozen you cannot follow anyone
  • follows with ranging and also magic and melee
  • if following a player then gets frozen, you cannot move.

SKILLS
added basic firemaking and thieving

What ive done.

1 - Fixet the trading Bug 2 - Changed Home 3 - Added basic modern teleport + ancient 4 - New shops 5 - new commands.

Commands

[QUOTE]
::pure
::banuser
::home (isent really needed)
::switch (v2 will have altar)[/QUOTE]

I now its not much but! its my first time im not using deltascape…so i guess its better than nothing i guess i got tired of delta…

[p.s]
dont mind about the size there is an backup folder thats why…

Pictures
Ancient Teleport

modern Teleport

Rune require to use the teleports

Combat


Download http://uppit.com/v/48UUJT4W
Use this client to play els you’ll dc when you use ancient http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VW8Y5P6K

Credits
95% for killmess
5% for me i GUESS!

Read full topic
